channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Rubbish Fire; INC#0209; 04:42AM; 13901 W Polk St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3XJgOOb; #Sylmar; Four firefighters (one fire engine) responded to reports of a rubbish fire in front of a church. Upon arrival, firefighters found the flames to be out (and a garden house on the ground nearby), and only smoldering wood remained. Due to the location being a house of worship, per protocol, LAPD and LAFD investigators were notified, and the cause is under investigation.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; AR11 AR25 E91; CH8; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0262; 05:52AM; 8304 S Broadway St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3pCj39u; #Florence; Twenty-six LAFD firefighters extinguished flames in a 20' x 60' one-story commercial building (site of a previous burn). Firefighters began in defensive operations, knocked down the bulk of the intense flames, and transitioned to an offensive attack to complete the suppression efforts in 20 minutes (6:12am). No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E46 E64 RA57 RA846 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Nicholas Prange

CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#0924; 12:40PM; 451 W Av 37; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NI58H1; #MountWashington; Firefighters extinguished the fire (in mostly dry grass) in 15 minutes, holding it to less than one-half of an acre. We thank the residents that helped to slow the progress with garden hoses, prior to LAFD arrival. No reported injuries. No structures damaged. Cause under investigation.; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E12 E201 E212 E250 E290 E44 E47 E55 EM1 H3 H4 HA3 HA4 T1 T12 T90; CH7; 12; Nicholas Prange

Brush Fire; INC#0924; 12:25PM; 3931 N West Point Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/46EsINB; #MountWashington; Approximately one-quarter acre of light/flashy fuels (ignites easily and burns quickly) burning uphill, with light wind. ; FS 44; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC1 BC2 E1 E12 E201 E212 E250 E290 E44 E55 EM1 H0C H0F T1 T12 T90; CH5; 12; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0006; 12:26AM; 1758 W 65th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43i60rn; Harvard Park; The first 20 firefighters arrived and quickly extinguished the outside fire exposing a liquor store and a residential building, in 24 minutes, limiting the nearby buildings only minor exterior damage. Nothing further.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 BC11 E226 E233 E26 E46 E66 E94 RA266 RA66 RA866 T26 T33; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0006; 12:02AM; 1758 W 65th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/43i60rn; #HarvardPark; Outside fire exposing a commercial building and a single-family home (which has smoke coming from the attic). Offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC1 E226 E26 E66 E94 RA66 RA866 T26; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1853; 11:13PM; 1370 E 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NwgUnK; Central-Alameda; It took 34 Firefighters 26 minutes to extinguish the flames consuming a detached garage, and eliminate the fire that spread into an upper unit of a nearby garden-style apartment building. One firefighter sustained a lower-extremity injury (non-life-threatening), and was taken to a local hospital for care. Nothing further.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 CM20 CM22 E10 E17 E209 E210 E221 E4 EM1 RA10 RA14 RA814 SQ21 T10 T21 T9; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1853; 10:47PM; 1370 E 20th St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3NwgUnK; #CentralAlameda; Detached garage with fire showing, and structures threatened on three sides.; FS 14; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 E17 E209 E210 RA14 T10; CH7; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1637; 10:04PM; 226 N Lake St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r79D6a; #Westlake; 24 Firefighters extinguished the two vehicles on fire, keeping the flames from spreading into the nearby commercial building. No reported injuries. Nothing further.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 BC11 E209 E220 E52 RA20 T20 T9; CH5; 2; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1637; 09:36PM; 226 N Lake St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3r79D6a; #Westlake; Two autos on fire, exposing a one-story commercial structure. Offensive mode.; FS 20; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 13; BC1 E209 E52 RA20 T9; CH5; 2; Nicholas Prange
